name: Ruby Staff
description: A staff made from polished ruby, infused with powerful magic.
looks: The Ruby Staff is a long and slender staff made entirely of polished ruby. It has a golden handle with intricate engravings of arcane symbols. At the top of the staff is a large ruby gem that glows with a deep red light.

special_weapon_skills.arcane_magic: Increases damage and effectiveness of arcane magic spells.

special_effects.fireball: Allows the wielder to cast fireball spells.

name: Flaming Sword
description: A sword enchanted with the element of fire, causing it to ignite in flames when drawn.
looks: The Flaming Sword has a long, curved blade with a silver finish. The hilt is made of dark wood with intricate carvings and a pommel in the shape of a fireball. When drawn, the blade bursts into flames, giving off a warm glow.

special_weapon_skills.fire_magic: Increases the power of fire spells.

name: Warhammer
description: A large and heavy warhammer that deals devastating blows to armored opponents.
looks: The warhammer has a long wooden handle with a leather grip. The head of the hammer is made of solid iron and has intricate engravings. It is designed to concentrate the force of each strike into a small area, making it ideal for crushing armor.

special_weapon_skills.crushing_blow: Increases the chance to stun or stagger opponents with each strike.

name: Steel Breastplate
description: A strong and protective breastplate made of steel.
looks: The steel breastplate is a solid piece of armor that covers the chest and upper torso. It is made from polished steel plates and has intricate engravings along the edges.

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made from pure silver.
looks: The Silver Sword has a polished silver blade with intricate engravings along the edges. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and adorned with a silver pommel in the shape of a falcon. The guard is made of silver and has a stylized wing design.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword, suitable for beginners.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single edge and a simple hilt. The blade is dull and slightly rusty.

name: Flaming Sword
description: A sword imbued with the power of fire
looks: The flaming sword has a long, curved blade with a fiery edge. The hilt is made from blackened metal with a grip wrapped in red leather.

special_weapon_skills.weapon_mastery_fire: Grants a bonus to Fire weapon mastery skill

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Sturdy gauntlets made of steel, providing excellent hand protection.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of polished steel plates, covering the hands and forearms. They are adorned with engraved patterns and have adjustable straps for a secure fit.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy gauntlets made of steel, providing excellent protection for the hands and wrists.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of thick and durable steel plates, covering the entire hand and extending up to the wrists. They have a rough texture and are secured with leather straps.

name: Acid Dagger
description: A dagger coated with deadly acid that inflicts additional corrosion damage.
looks: The acid dagger has a slim and sleek design, with a curved blade and a hilt wrapped in black leather. The blade is coated with a greenish liquid that constantly drips onto the ground.

special_effects.corrosive_coating: Has a chance to apply a corrosion effect on targets, reducing their armor.

name: Adamantite Sword
description: A powerful sword forged from the rare and durable metal known as adamantite.
looks: The Adamantite Sword is a long, broad blade with a curved, single-edged design. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip, and the pommel is decorated with ornate engravings.

special_effects.critical_hit_chance: Increases the chance to score a critical hit.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielding.
special_weapon_skills.parry: Grants a bonus to Parry skill when wielding.

name: Iron Sword
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade, with a simple crossguard and grip. It is made of sturdy iron, with a slight sheen on the blade.

special_weapon_skills.sword: Allows the use of sword-related skills and abilities

name: Fireball Staff
description: A staff imbued with the power of fire, capable of casting powerful fireball spells.
looks: The Fireball Staff is a long wooden staff with intricate carvings along its length. At the top, there is a crystal orb that glows with a fiery red color.

special_weapon_skils.fire_magic: Grants a bonus to Fire Magic skill when wielded.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy suit of armor made from steel plates
looks: The armor is made up of interlocking steel plates, covering the entire body. It has a full helm with a visor that can be raised or lowered.

name: Magic Wand
description: A wooden wand imbued with magical energy
looks: The wand is made of polished wood with intricate carvings along its length. It has a smooth and curved handle, ending in a pointed tip.

special_weapon_skills.wand_proficiency: Increases damage and spellcasting ability with wands.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the potency of spells cast using this wand.
